subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
I am Miss Yuri Melon A computer scientist and i am working with central bank of Nigeria I am contacting you
concerning your funds which were discovered in a dormant account withour bank. I noticed that your money could not be transferred because of lack of proof for the source of the funds.
The only thing I will need to release this fund is a special HARD
DISK. You will buy two of this special Hard disk and send to me and i
will use it to  recopy your information, destroy the previous one, and
punch the computer to reflect in your bank within 24 banking hours. I
will clean up the tracer and destroy your file, after which I will
relocate to meet with you. If you are interested. Do get in touch with
me immediately, You should send to me your convenient tell/fax numbers for easy communications and also re confirm your banking details, so that there won't be any mistakes.
I wait for your response, also send your current telephone contact so
that we can discuss this ASAP.
Regards,
Yuri Melon.

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Yuri Melon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your job as a computer scientist sounds fascinating! I'm not very tech-savvy myself, so the idea of using a special hard disk to transfer funds is quite intriguing.

Could you please explain more about this special hard disk? What makes it different from regular ones? And where could I possibly purchase such disks?

Also, I'm curious about the process of recopying and destroying files. How does that work exactly? 

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lisa
